channel.title: Is there a way to back your Brindlewood Bay kickstarter outside of kickstarter?
channel.description:
Is there a way to back your Brindlewood Bay kickstarter outside of kickstarter? Because Kickstarter apparently needs a credit card (and credit card only) and I am from Europe - Germany specifically, and I do not own a credit card, do not need one in my day-to-day life and will not get one just for the kickstarter. I wanted to contact you via Email, but alas I could not find an email address anywhere on the homepage or at the kickstarter site.
Kind regards, G.

item.title: Is there a way to back your Brindlewood Bay kickstarter outside of kickstarter?
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:

Iâ€™d write to gauntletpubish@gmail.com or message them at @gauntletpub on Twitter.
